name: Atanuwë, the Nag-Lord
description: A nine-legged unicorn chaos godling ("Old Shub") ruling a Court of Chaos at Sargstone (hex 0904). It commands crookhorn brigands, atacorns, harridans, corrupted unicorns, harpies, and other monstrous humanoids. Its acts are laced with cosmic irony, absurdity, and horrific slapstick, driving Dolmenwood toward the Weird.

enclaves.name: Baron Fragglehorn’s Tower
enclaves.role: Base of operations in the Valley of Wise Beasts; safeguard against attack from the east.

enclaves.name: The Camp of Captain Snarkscorn
enclaves.role: Semi-permanent military outpost guarding the Court against attack from the west.

enclaves.name: Cottage of Shub’s Nanna
enclaves.role: Dwelling of Shub’s Nanna, a favored servant who supplies the Court with kidnapped children.

enclaves.name: Court of the Nag-Lord
enclaves.role: Court of Chaos; lair of Atanuwë and its most powerful servants and minions.

enclaves.name: The Deceiver’s Well
enclaves.role: Hiding place of the atacorn Hawalyeer.

enclaves.name: Ignormwm’s Cottage
enclaves.role: Dwelling of the atacorn Ignormwm and her spawn.

enclaves.name: The Nagwood
enclaves.role: Twisted woods overrun by evil trees and crookhorns; sorcerous malaise that twists the mind.

enclaves.name: The Valley of Wise Beasts
enclaves.role: Long valley of awakened talking humanoid animals (Cobbins).

enclaves.name: The Village of Cobton-on-the-Shiver
enclaves.role: Centre of Cobbin culture in the Valley; watched over by a crookhorn garrison.

enclaves.name: The Village of Dreg
enclaves.role: Hiding place of the atacorn Crewithyant.

resources.name: Court of Chaos at Sargstone
resources.description: The Court established at Sargstone (hex 0904), nexus of two ley lines; seat of Atanuwë's absolute authority.

resources.name: Crookhorn Brigands
resources.description: Breggles corrupted by Atanuwë who carry out its whims; an ever-increasing force threatening travel and civilization (notably Prigwort, hex 1106).

resources.name: Atacorns
resources.description: Spawn of the Nag-Lord, unicorn-things with human features and cruel humor; three remain in Dolmenwood (Ignormwm, Crewithyant, Hawalyeer).

resources.name: Harridan Soothsayers
resources.description: Witches corrupted into hideous ogres; serve as lieutenants and soothsayers.

resources.name: Harpies and Giant Humanoids
resources.description: A menagerie of chaotic monsters: wicked harpies, twisted ogres, and evil fomorians gathered at the Court.

resources.name: Corrupt Unicorn Lieutenants
resources.description: A small number of unicorns thoroughly corrupted; assist in war and dark sorcery.

goals.name: Become Ruler of All Dolmenwood
goals.notes: Expand dominion to encompass the whole of Dolmenwood and beyond.

goals.name: Marriage With Gheillough
goals.notes: Summon the slumbering dragon-spirit Gheillough, complete its corruption into pure Chaos, and wed it.

goals.name: Collect the Bones of Holy People
goals.notes: Expand a collection of saints' skulls, revivified for the Court’s amusement.

on_complete.text: Crookhorn raids intensify on the southern roads; travelers vanish and villages lock their gates at dusk.
A mind-warping malaise creeps outward from the Nagwood; hunters return glassy-eyed and laughing.
A shrine’s ossuary was found empty; laughter and hoofprints trail into the woods.

action_library.name: Kidnap children for the Court’s larder

on_complete.text: Children have gone missing near a rustic cottage; silver-eyed goats were seen on the moonlit lane.

action_library.name: Deepen Gheillough’s corruption in Lake Longmere

on_complete.text: The lake water tastes wrong; dreams of braying laughter spread among those who sleep near the shore.

leader.name: Atanuwë, the Nag-Lord
leader.role: Chaos godling; absolute ruler of the faction.

organization.notes: Atanuwë is a godling comparable to Dolmenwood's Wood Gods; it can bestow magical powers and teach dark secrets, but cannot grant spells like a true deity (e.g., the Pluritine god is of a higher order).

atanuwe.demeanour: Cruel, decadent, utterly narcissistic; basks in flattery; loves absurd injustice.

speech.style: Suave insinuations punctuated with lunatic braying

attacks.name: spellcasting
attacks.notes: May cast listed arcane spells without limit.

attacks.name: hypnotic_gaze
attacks.notes: Save vs Spell or Dominate effect.

immunities: only harmed by magic or magic weapons

special.jellification: Horn victim must Save vs Doom or become a pool of jelly.

atanuwe.gender_note: Transcendent of human concepts of gender; commonly referred to as “it”.

baron_lucius_fragglehorn.name: Baron Lucius Fragglehorn
baron_lucius_fragglehorn.appearance: Monstrously obese crookhorn man, 8' tall, one milky weeping eye; three horns curve downward like a veil.
baron_lucius_fragglehorn.demeanour: Lecherous, debauched, brutal; terrified of snakes.

family.note: Willing concubines of the powerful crookhorn lord.

special.disease: Save vs Doom or afflicted by nasty infection (crookhorn disease).

captain_gib_snarkscorn.name: Captain Gib Snarkscorn
captain_gib_snarkscorn.appearance: Lanky 7'6" crookhorn man in rag-tag plate, huge wooden shield (repurposed barn door).
captain_gib_snarkscorn.demeanour: Cruel bully, prone to random rages; loves wild music and debauchery.
desires: Depose Baron Fragglehorn as lord of the Valley of Wise Beasts
Capture Lady Haeroth (escaped by trickery twice)

special.disease: Save vs Doom or afflicted by nasty infection (crookhorn disease).

shubs_nanna.name: Shub’s Nanna
shubs_nanna.appearance: Elderly longhorn woman with flowing pale tan fur; silver eyes with violet pupils; black dresses and green shawl.
shubs_nanna.role: Favored servant responsible for keeping Atanuwë’s larder stocked with plump human children.
shubs_nanna.demeanour: Acts kindly and coddling; schemes to trap visitors; loves flattery.

speech.style: Absent-minded blather, baby talk, bleating cackles

desires: To be young and fair again

possessions.name: Magical goat-sleigh
possessions.effect: Carries Nanna + 4 passengers anywhere along ley line Lamm in minutes; used to visit hex 0904.

possessions.name: Arcane Whip
possessions.effect: 1d6+2 damage, 10' reach; woven from hair of elf maidens

summoning.conditions: Call on a moonlit night within Dolmenwood.
summoning.response: Nanna may dispatch goblins to the caller.
summoning.goblin_departure: may return at will; vanish into mist within 3 rounds

ignormwm.name: Ignormwm
ignormwm.role: Atacorn spawn of the Nag-Lord; dwells with her spawn.
ignormwm.demeanour: Bizarre, cruel sense of humour (typical of atacorns).
ignormwm.notes: One of the three atacorns who remain in Dolmenwood.

crewithyant.name: Crewithyant
crewithyant.role: Atacorn hiding in the village of Dreg.
crewithyant.demeanour: Bizarre, cruel sense of humour (typical of atacorns).
crewithyant.notes: One of the three atacorns who remain in Dolmenwood.

hawalyeer.name: Hawalyeer
hawalyeer.role: Atacorn hidden at the Deceiver’s Well.
hawalyeer.demeanour: Bizarre, cruel sense of humour (typical of atacorns).
hawalyeer.notes: One of the three atacorns who remain in Dolmenwood.

lore.origin: Not native to Dolmenwood; provenance obscured by illusion, treachery, and lies.
lore.arrival: Entered Dolmenwood ~400 years ago; established a dominion from which to ooze unsettling influence.
lore.sargstone: Wrested Sargstone (hex 0904) from the Drune by dispatching its warden and subjugating its power.
lore.crookhorns: Corrupted northern breggles, giving birth to the crookhorns.
lore.gheillough: Poisoned Lake Longmere, keeping the water-dragon Gheillough in dream-wracked torpor and usurping its regulator role.
lore.valley_of_wise_beasts: As a pet project, Atanuwë awakened sentience in the valley animals and gave them humanoid form (Cobbins), trapping them in a nightmare of quaint tea parties and police-state terror under crookhorn rule.
lore.minions_called: After establishing the Court around Sargstone, Atanuwë invited all creatures of Chaos to bow; a ghastly menagerie flowed through the Court’s gates and pledged allegiance. Its whim is law.
lore.feasts: Feasts and banquets are constant: mounds of decaying food crushed beneath piles of fresh delicacies.

references.notes: Translated from provided PDF summary (Atanuwë faction entry) into engine-friendly JSON.

notes: Spawn of the Nag-Lord, birthed by unholy union with a harridan.
One is slain (Sallowbryg). Three remain in Dolmenwood; fourteen roamed to distant lands to spread discord.
